title: Refresh Button is clickable
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron
And have ticket(s) to event(s)
When I am navigated to the Events Page
Then I am able to click the refresh button on the Events Page

title: Tutorial Card is downloadable
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron
And have ticket(s) to event(s)
When I am navigated to the Events Page
Then I am able to click the Read Tutorial button on the Events Page
And a PDF is downloaded

title: Invite People Button is clickable
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron
And have ticket(s) to event(s)
When I am navigated to the Events Page
Then I am able to click the Invite People button on an Event

title: No tickets available message is displayed
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron
And I have no tickets to an event
When I am navigated to the Events Page
Then I see a message that reads "There are no upcoming events found. If youâ€™re expecting events to be here, click the Refresh button or contact your group ticketing sales representative."

title: Unverified Patron modal "refresh button" is clickable
custom_test_purpose:
Given I login as an Unverified Patron with tickets
When I am navigated to the Events page
And I click "invite people" button for an event
And the Unverified Patron modal pops up
And I click Refresh
Then the modal will pop up again

title: Unverified Patron is able to Log Out
custom_steps:
Given I login as an Unverified Patron with tickets
When I am navigated to the Events page
And I click "invite people" button for an event
And the Unverified Patron modal pops up
Then I can close the modal 
And I am able to click the hamburger menu
And Log out

title: Unverified Patron modal doesn't pop up after verifying the patron
custom_steps:
Given I login as an Unverified Patron with tickets
And I am navigated to the Events page
And I click "invite people" button for an event
And the Unverified Patron modal pops up
When I send a API request to resend the verification email
And I login to the email account to open the message and verify the patron
Then the modal will not pop up again when I click invite people button
